```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)

dairy = tt_load(2019,5)

clean_cheese <- dairy$clean_cheese
clean_cheese <- clean_cheese %>% rename(year = Year) 
milk_product_facts <- dairy$milk_products_facts

joined <- inner_join(clean_cheese, dairy$milk_products_facts, by = "year")
joined1 <- select(joined, "Cheddar":"Foods and spreads", "cheese_american":"cheese_cottage")
summary(joined1)

clean_cheese_long <- clean_cheese %>%
  gather(cheese_type, lbs_per_person, -year) 

  
ggplot(clean_cheese) + geom_line(aes(x=clean_cheese$year, y=clean_cheese$`Total Natural Cheese`, color = "Total Natural Cheese")) +
  geom_line(aes(x=clean_cheese$year, clean_cheese$`Total Processed Cheese Products`, color = "Total Processed Cheese")) 
  
ggplot(clean_cheese) + geom_line(aes(x=clean_cheese$year, y=clean_cheese$`Total Italian Cheese`, color = "Total Italian Cheese"))+
  geom_line(aes(x=clean_cheese$year, y=clean_cheese$`Total American Chese`, color = "Total American Cheese"))

ANOVA <- aov(year~cheese_type, data = clean_cheese_long)
summary(ANOVA)
```
